page.title: 14A View of College Buildings.
page.content: From the cricket pavilion looking towards the school,Junior House can be seen on the extreme left. Next is St. Cuthbert's House in early 20th Century style. A new infirmary for elderly monks is being constructed on the left-hand end of the Monastery. The Abbey Church ajoins the opposite end. To the right of the church stands the Old House (Geogian). This is being demolished to be replaced by a major redevelopment of this central area. Further to the right is a large building which includes St.John's and St.Aidan's houses,the College Library, the Laboratories, and the Headmaster's rooms. To the south of this complex is the Theatre and Gymnasium. Attached to these is the new Music Centre which is nearing completion.
